subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Justine Henin won her first title since coming out of retirement, defeating Samantha Stosur, 6-4, 2-6, 6-1, on clay Sunday in the final of the Porsche Grand Prix in Stuttgart, Germany.
snippet: Justine Henin won her first title since coming out of retirement, defeating Samantha Stosur, 6-4, 2-6, 6-1, on clay Sunday in the final of the Porsche Grand Prix in Stuttgart, Germany.
